news_header: Venezuela is receiving air-borne immigrants from the U.S. as part of a project to transfer thousands back, with some allegedly linked to illegal activities.
news_original_title: Karkotukset Yhdysvalloista Venezuelaan alkoivat – kaksi lentokoneellista siirtolaisia matkalla
news_text: According to the Venezuelan administration, two air-borne immigrants from the United States are on their way to Venezuela. U.S. President Donald Trump announced that Venezuela agreed to accept all illegal immigrants from the U.S. The flights operated by Conviasa mark the beginning of a project to transfer thousands of people back from the U.S. to Venezuela. Some individuals on the flight are reportedly involved with the Tren de Aragua gang.
